description: Retrieves the bandwidth rate limit schedule for a specified gateway. By default, gateways do not have bandwidth rate limit schedules, which means no bandwidth rate limiting is in effect. Use this to get a gateway's bandwidth rate limit schedule.

parameters.name: GatewayArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: BandwidthRateLimitIntervals
nested_items.description: An array containing bandwidth rate limit schedule intervals for a gateway. When no bandwidth rate limit intervals have been scheduled, the array is empty.

nested_items.name: AverageUploadRateLimitInBitsPerSec
nested_items.description: The average upload rate limit component of the bandwidth rate limit interval, in bits per second. This field does not appear in the response if the upload rate limit is not set.

nested_items.name: DaysOfWeek
nested_items.description: The days of the week component of the bandwidth rate limit interval, represented as ordinal numbers from 0 to 6, where 0 represents Sunday and 6 represents Saturday.

nested_items.name: EndHourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour of the day to end the bandwidth rate limit interval.

nested_items.name: EndMinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute of the hour to end the bandwidth rate limit interval.

nested_items.name: StartHourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour of the day to start the bandwidth rate limit interval.

nested_items.name: StartMinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute of the hour to start the bandwidth rate limit interval. The interval begins at the start of that minute. To begin an interval exactly at the start of the hour, use the value 0.

nested_items.name: GatewayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.
